castVote(uint256,uint256,uint256[2],uint.details: Only callable by authorized relayer wallets during voting period

params.merkleTreeDepth: Depth of the Merkle tree used in the Semaphore group
params.nullifierHash: Unique nullifier to prevent double voting
params.publicSignals: Array of public signals [signal, nullifierHash, merkleRoot, externalNullifier]

returns._0: Array of vote counts indexed by candidate ID

returns.endTime: The end time of the voting session
returns.groupId: The group ID of the voting session
returns.numCandidates: The number of candidates in the voting session
returns.startTime: The start time of the voting session
returns.votes: The total number of votes cast

params._groupId: Semaphore group ID for eligible voters

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addRelayer(address).notice: Add organizational wallet as authorized relayer

castVote(uint256,uint256,uint256[2],uint.notice: Cast anonymous vote using ZK proof

getAllVoteCounts().notice: Get vote counts for all candidates

getVoteCount(uint256).notice: Get current vote count for a candidate

isNullifierUsed(uint256).notice: Check if nullifier has been used

isVotingActive().notice: Check if voting is currently active

pauseVoting().notice: Pause voting in case of emergency
